nodes.text: The C/L-82 landspeeder was a landspeeder model produced by Mobquet Swoops and Speeders prior to the outbreak of the Clone Wars. It was a popular design in the Core Worlds around 25 BBY.

The C/L-82 featured a retro design and could easily be maintained and customized, making it a favorite of young pilots in the Outer Rim Territories. The White Witch, the speeder owned by the famous racers Thall Joben and Jord Dusat, was a modified C/L-82.
